Oct. 10, 1987 D North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Three)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Three) 430 Own Choice Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-third-section
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £100 and trophy, 2nd £60, 3rd £50. 29th annual contest 8 bands competed.
Oct. 22, 2014, 10:10 a.m. March 29, 2017, 2:09 p.m.
1 Sir Richard Arkwright's Masson Mills Band Stephen Shimwell
2 Shirebrook Band Brian Draper
3 Riddings Band Geoff Gossage
4 Ireland Colliery Band Francis Evans
Unknown Result Chesterfield & District Roy Walters
Unknown Result Tideswell Band Tony Cresswell
Unknown Result Kirkby Colliery Welfare Band Steve Johnson
Unknown Result Staveley Works Band Alan Needham

Withdrawn Oughtibridge Band A. W. McLauchlan
